text: Allah ki taraf se agar koi pabandi tumpar hai to woh yeh hai ke murdaar na khao, khoon se aur suwar (swine) ke gosht se parheiz karo aur koi aisi cheez na khao jispar Allah ke siwa kisi aur ka naam liya gaya ho, haan jo shaks majboori ki haalat mein ho aur woh inmein se koi cheez kha le bagair iske ke woh kanoon shikani ka irada rakhta ho ya zaroorat ki hadd se tajawuz karey, to uspar kuch gunaah nahin. Allah bakshne wala aur reham karne wala hai
